all_text_timv: Moyer, David. Infinitely perfect / by David Moyer. Muncy, Pa. : Red Howler Press, 2005. 34 unnumbered pages : chiefly illustrations ; 25 cm text txt rdacontent unmediated n rdamedia volume nc rdacarrier "Written and drawn in Spring 2005. The letterpress edition was printed and bound by Kent Aldrich of the Nomadic Press in Saint Paul, Minnesota, Spring 2006"--Colophon. Issued in a box measuring 26 cm. with a printed label on spine. Rare Books copy is no. 7 of 50 signed copies, and is lacking box. Artists' books United States. Aldrich, Kent Alan. Red Howler Press, publisher. Nomadic Press, printer. Red Howler Press
general_note_ssm: "Written and drawn in Spring 2005. The letterpress edition was printed and bound by Kent Aldrich of the Nomadic Press in Saint Paul, Minnesota, Spring 2006"--Colophon.
Issued in a box measuring 26 cm. with a printed label on spine.
Rare Books copy is no. 7 of 50 signed copies, and is lacking box.
